channel.title: Owner and Admin.. On a 508?
channel.description:
Ok, well... How do I put myself an owner on a 508? is it in bin-data-characters-mainsave-macoronizer ( my username )... After that, what do I do. I can't even understand.. look, this is what I get when I open my character file.
獵牥慮敭洺捡牯湯穩牥瀀獡睳牯㩤ㄳ㜵㈱㔰㜹5楲桧獴〺愀獢㩸㈳㈲愀獢㩹㈳㜱栀楥桧㩴0畲敮敮杲㩹〱2瑡慴正瑳汹㩥1潰湩獴〺愀瑵牯瑥污慩整〺猀数楣污浡畯瑮ㄺ〰猀畫汬楴敭㩲0敧摮牥〺氀潯に〺氀潯ㅫㄺ0潬歯㨲㠱氀潯㍫㈺6潬歯㨴㌳氀潯㕫㌺6潬歯㨶㈴猀楫汬㨰ⰱ0歳汩ㅬㄺ〬猀楫汬㨲ⰱ0歳汩㍬ㄺⰱ㔱㔴猀楫汬㨴ⰱ0歳汩㕬ㄺ〬猀楫汬㨶ⰱ0歳汩㝬ㄺ〬猀楫汬㨸ⰱ0歳汩㥬ㄺ〬猀楫汬〱ㄺ〬猀楫汬ㄱㄺ〬猀楫汬㈱ㄺ〬猀楫汬㌱ㄺ〬猀楫汬㐱ㄺ〬猀楫汬㔱ㄺ〬猀楫汬㘱ㄺ〬猀楫汬㜱ㄺ〬猀楫汬㠱ㄺ〬猀楫汬㤱ㄺ〬猀楫汬〲ㄺ〬猀楫汬ㄲㄺ〬猀楫汬㈲ㄺ〬猀楫汬㌲ㄺ〬猀楫汬㐲ㄺ〬渀汵l
:eek:... so yea, I made my friend and admin, him was the same thing, but the first number that I saw on his character file, I changed it to a 2 = admin. It work for him.. But me, it doesn't... -.- Help pwease? :) It's maybe a stupid question, but I'm a noob, so yea..

item.title: Owner and Admin.. On a 508?
item.dc:creator: @Macoronizer Macoronizer
item.description:
@Macoronizer wrote:

Ok, well… How do I put myself an owner on a 508? is it in bin-data-characters-mainsave-macoronizer ( my username )… After that, what do I do. I can’t even understand… look, this is what I get when I open my character file.
